wikipedia_page.main: Eileen Vidal BEM (died October, 2003) was a kelper telephone and radio operator who maintained radio service and relayed military intelligence to the British Navy during the Falklands War, receiving the British Empire Medal for her service.

response: *Eileen Vidal, kelper telephone and radio operatorFalkland Islands Newsletter, No. 86, March, 2004. Falkland Islands Association. Accessed 14 November 2017
